name: Curiosity Queller
description:
Thank you ‘sunny, make sure my cats don’t get into any mischief now!

In Curiosity Queller you are abruptly thrust into the wild world of pet care! Your Job is simple, if you see one of granny’s precious little kitties pawing at something they shouldn’t, grab them and plop them down somewhere a little more safe.

This game was created for Extra Credits Game Jam #6. The project was conceived and directed by James Jacobus, with the help of his friends David and Trevor who did the 3D modeling and art and Neil who did the music and sound. The game features an original score and the voice acting talents of the whole team (David was the lawnmower). Runs on Windows at 1920 x 1280.
